DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe two cohort cystic fibrosis patient treat 2 different decade term FEV1 ( Forced Expiratory Volume one second ) maintenance .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Observational Study Compare Cystic Fibrosis Patients Two Decades Before After 2000
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study describe two cohort cystic fibrosis patient treat term FEV1 maintenance age 10 15 2000 .
DOC.criteria: Patients Cystic Fibrosis diagnose neonatal screening Patients bear 01/01/1979 12/31/1984 ( Cohort 1 ) patient bear 01/01/1991 12/31/1996 ( Cohort 2 ) Patients least 2 FEV1 yearly measurement age 10 15 Patients malignant tumor Patients meconium ileus Patients transplantation ( pneumectomy lobectomy ) Patients involved clinical trial Patients move another Clinical Center
